    public class EditBookFragment
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Author:
    Natalia, Chloe, Kimberly; This class takes in a book and edits it Title, Author, ISBN and photograph. The first three Can also delete and edit book image. can be done manually or via scanning the book's ISBN

      • validateInputs

        private boolean validateInputs(java.lang.String validateTitle,
                               java.lang.String validateAuthor,
                               java.lang.String validateISBN)
        Validates that the required fields are not left empty or given an invalid value at the time of confirming changes made to the book
        Parameters:
        validateTitle - string that is in the title field
        validateAuthor - sting that is in the author field
        validateISBN - string that is in the ISBN field
        Returns:
        boolean true if all fields are non empty and given valid values, false otherwise

      • nullPhoto

        private boolean nullPhoto()
        Determines if the book's photograph has a null bitmap
        Returns:
        boolean true if the book's photograph has a null bitmap, false otherwise

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             @Nullable
                             android.content.Intent data)
        Logic for returning from the camera for scanning or taking a picture for the book photograph. If requestCode is 2, the image's bitmap is set as the book photograph's bitmap, otherwise the ISBN is set as the book's ISBN and the author and title fields are filled based on information from ISBN
        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - 2 if picture was taken for the book photograph, otherwise return from scan activity
        resultCode - result code from finished activity
        data - image bitmap if requestCode is 2, isbn information otherwise

      • parseJson

        private void parseJson(java.lang.String key)
        Given a webpage built from the ISBN, find the book's information and fill the title and author fields
        Parameters:
        key - webpage url built from the ISBN

      • isNetworkAvailable

        private boolean isNetworkAvailable()
        Check if connnected to the internet
        Returns:
        boolean true if connected, false otherwise

      • currentUser

        public void currentUser(Callback cbh)
        currentUser uses the current instance of the firebase auth to get the information of the current user and create a User based on it. Because onComplete is asynchronous (so the info won't arrive until after the code completes) we need to use onCallBack interface. It will take the info and allow the information to be used (without null).
        Parameters:
        cbh - callback of the user
